General.Name: TTFB Co Ltd
General.Description: TTFB Company Limited operates a chain of restaurants in Taiwan. It also engages in the wholesale and retail of food and beverages. In addition, the company retails agricultural and aquatic products. Further, it engages in the information software, and cleaning and environmental businesses. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 176, Jianyi Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
